text: Fools of Fate is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithLibrary of Congress. Motion Picture, Broadcasting, and Recorded Sound Division, Kemp R. Niver. Early Motion Pictures: The Paper Print Collection in the Library of CongressFOOLS OF FATE and stars James Kirkwood, Marion Leonard, and Frank Powell. ==Actors== * James Kirkwood as Ben Webster * Marion Leonard as Fanny Webster * Frank Powell as Ed Hilton * Henry B. Walthall ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Fools of Fate
